articles.title: Trump signs big tax cut and spending bill into law in July Fourth ceremony
articles.description: President Donald Trump signed his sweeping tax cut and spending package, known as the "big, beautiful bill," into law during a July Fourth ceremony filled with patriotic symbolism.

articles.title: Deadly flooding catastrophe devastates Texas towns
articles.description: Devastating floods swept through parts of Texas along the Guadalupe River, resulting in at least 24 deaths and leaving 20 girls missing from a summer camp in the area.

articles.title: Hamas gives 'positive response' to Gaza ceasefire mediators
articles.description: Hamas announced that it had given a thumbs-up to the latest ceasefire proposal, but added that further talks were needed.
